de:
La Source "Bar Artistique" welcomes you in an authentic wooden structure with a lively cultural programme (concerts, theatre, dance evenings)...
Aubrac meat burgers with homemade sauces and garnishes. Tapas of the month.  In winter, a seasonal restaurant.
ru:
La Source "Bar Artistique" welcomes you in an authentic wooden structure with a lively cultural programme (concerts, theatre, dance evenings)...
Aubrac meat burgers with homemade sauces and garnishes. Tapas of the month.  In winter, a seasonal restaurant.
en: Artistic bar. Concerts, theatre, dance evenings. Traditional bar operation: open Friday to Sunday at 3pm from September to May and Tuesday to Sunday at 3pm from mid-June to August.
it:
La Source "Bar Artistique" welcomes you in an authentic wooden structure with a lively cultural programme (concerts, theatre, dance evenings)...
Aubrac meat burgers with homemade sauces and garnishes. Tapas of the month.  In winter, a seasonal restaurant.
fr: Une cuisine simple et élaborée avec des produits locaux. Retrouvez des burgers à la viande d’Aubrac 100% locale, des burgers végétarien. Les bonnes frites. Laissez-vous aussi tenter par une ribambelle de tapas, de charcuterie et produits végétariens.
zh:
La Source "Bar Artistique" welcomes you in an authentic wooden structure with a lively cultural programme (concerts, theatre, dance evenings)...
Aubrac meat burgers with homemade sauces and garnishes. Tapas of the month.  In winter, a seasonal restaurant.
es:
La Source "Bar Artistique" welcomes you in an authentic wooden structure with a lively cultural programme (concerts, theatre, dance evenings)...
Aubrac meat burgers with homemade sauces and garnishes. Tapas of the month.  In winter, a seasonal restaurant.
nl:
La Source "Bar Artistique" ontvangt u in een authentieke houten structuur met een levendig cultureel programma (concerten, theater, dansavonden)...
Aubrac vleesburgers met zelfgemaakte sauzen en garnituren. Tapas van de maand.  In de winter, seizoensgebonden catering.

hasBeenCreatedBy.schema:legalName: Office de Tourisme du Pays de Lamastre

hasBeenPublishedBy.schema:legalName: Agence de Développement Touristique de l'Ardèche - source : Apidae Tourisme
